meaningMnemonic: The <radical>eye</radical> radical and <kanji>eye</kanji> kanji are the same as each other, so now you know them both.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>eyes</kanji> are important to you, right? Sadly, one of your eyes is missing right now, because a sheep grabbed it and pulled it out, and is now running away from you, yelling his sheep call.... "<reading>Mehhhhhh</reading> (め)!"
